ch.aplu.raspisim

Class Motor

  • java.lang.Object
    • Actor
      • ch.aplu.raspisim.Part
        • ch.aplu.raspisim.Motor

  • public class Motor
extends Part
    Class that represents one of the motors.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int LEFT
      Motor id for left motor.
      static int RIGHT
      Motor id for right motor.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Motor(int id)
      Creates a motor instance with given id.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void backward()
      Starts the backward rotation.
      void forward()
      Starts the forward rotation.
      int getId()
      Returns the port of the motor.
      int getSpeed()
      Returns the current speed (arbitrary units).
      boolean isMoving()
      Checks if motor is rotating.
      void setSpeed(int speed)
      Sets the speed to the given value (arbitrary units).
      void stop()
      Stops the rotation.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • LEFT

        public static int LEFT
        Motor id for left motor.

      • RIGHT

        public static int RIGHT
        Motor id for right motor.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Motor

        public Motor(int id)
        Creates a motor instance with given id. In simulation mode, there is no movement with one motor only.
        Parameters:
        id - 0 for left motor, 1 for right motor

    • Method Detail

      • forward

        public void forward()
        Starts the forward rotation. Method returns immediately, while the rotation continues.

      • backward

        public void backward()
        Starts the backward rotation. Method returns immediately, while the rotation continues.

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stops the rotation.

      • setSpeed

        public void setSpeed(int speed)
        Sets the speed to the given value (arbitrary units).
        Parameters:
        speed - the speed 0..100

      • getSpeed

        public int getSpeed()
        Returns the current speed (arbitrary units).
        Returns:
        the speed 0..100

      • getId

        public int getId()
        Returns the port of the motor.
        Returns:
        the motor port

      • isMoving

        public boolean isMoving()
        Checks if motor is rotating. Calls Thread.sleep(1) to prevent CPU overload in close polling loops.
        Returns:
        true, if motor is rotating; otherwise false
